thread.title: Real Time Economics: Oil Prices Climb | Trade Fight Causes Collateral Damage | Larry Kudlow Steps Into the Spotlight

author: blogs.wsj.com
title: Real Time Economics: Oil Prices Climb | Trade Fight Causes Collateral Damage | Larry Kudlow Steps Into the Spotlight
text: This is the web version of the WSJ’s daily economic newsletter. You can sign up for daily delivery here. Good morning! Today we look at fallout from higher oil prices, some collateral damage from the U.S.-China trade spat, and Larry Kudlow’s transition from a cable-news commentator to the president’s top economic adviser. CRUDE AWAKENING Oil prices have been   How More Than a Billion People Got Access to Financial Services in Less Than a Decade Next Steel Tariffs Likely to Lead to U.S. Job Losses, Fed Economists Find
